name: There's room for only one Hero
name_original: There's room for only one Hero
description:
THERE'S ROOM FOR ONLY ONE HERO 

Hello adventurer!

You are on the dawn of a great battle against the Lord Daemon...
Unfortunately, your king's hero is weak and cowardly... If you don't help him in his quest then the world will perish and you with it ... 
Steal the Lord's armor during the night and bring it back to your king and
become the real hero since There's room for only one Hero! Features :

Inside the storage room, you'll have to find all of the Lord's armor piece without getting spotted by the guards. Of course, you've came prepared.

  • Stealing : Things are easy to steal, but this might become a burden.
  • Hiding : Taking advatages of the orc lack of brain, you can hide inside various things !
  • Escape : Use advantage of your favorite equipment, the smoke bomb, to fool the guards !
  • Quick : Daytime is almost there ! Get those armor pieces before it's too late !

We hope, you'll have fun and you're gonna enjoy our little game.

Previews The game is really laggy and buggy on the WebGL version because of the light which cost a lot, using the Desktop version is advised.
